constraints.name: edge_retention_limit
constraints.description: 保留的边数不超过 K

constraints.name: connectivity
constraints.description: 图必须连通（任意顶点可以从顶点 1 到达）

constraints.name: shortest_path_preservation
constraints.description: 删除边后，从顶点 1 到其他顶点的最短路径长度不变
constraints.formal: d_i' = d_i for all good vertices i

constraints.name: maximize_good_vertices
constraints.description: 最大化满足最短路径长度不变的顶点数量
